page.title: 14YOUTH CLUB
page.content: The Youth club is at the Wrenthorpe Methodist Church it is held on Wedesday night from half past 6 till 8 o'clock .You can get toffee logs and Cola bottles and pop and more. You can play table tennis there.They have got some balls,that you can play catch with.There are some big mats that you can practice head stands or hand stands on.There are snooker, tables and pool tables. The grown ups are Mr and Mrs Roberts and Mrs Wainwrite.Most of the girls in our class,class 5,go to the Youth club.It is 25p if you don't go to church,and if you do go to church it is only 15p.Sometimes we go swimming with the Youth club.You can play swingball and football outside when the sun is shining.Ten minutes before you go you listen to a story.
